Reference: Zachary C. Holman, Miha Filipič, Antoine Descoeudres, Stefaan De Wolf, Franc Smole, Marko Topič and Christophe Ballif, 'Infrared light management in high-efficiency silicon heterojunction and rear-passivated solar cells', Journal of Applied Physics 113, pp.013107, (2013)
